mapper.select:
SELECT m.MENU_ID as menuId, m.MENU_NM as menuNm, m.MENU_DC as menuDc, m.PARENT_MENU_ID as parentMenuId, m.MENU_ORDR as menuOrdr, m.MENU_URL as menuUrl, m.ICON_NM as iconNm, m.USE_AT as useAt, m.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM as frstRegistPnttm, m.FRST_REGISTER_ID as frstRegisterId, m.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM as lastUpdtPnttm, m.LAST_UPDUSR_ID as lastUpdusrId, p.MENU_NM as parentMenuNm, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MES_MENU_INFO c WHERE c.PARENT_MENU_ID = m.MENU_ID) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as hasChildren FROM MES_MENU_INFO m LEFT JOIN MES_MENU_INFO p ON m.PARENT_MENU_ID = p.MENU_ID WHERE m.USE_AT = 'Y'
AND m.MENU_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{menuNm}, '%')
AND m.PARENT_MENU_ID = #{parentMenuId}
ORDER BY m.PARENT_MENU_ID, m.MENU_ORDR, m.MENU_ID

SELECT m.MENU_ID as menuId, m.MENU_NM as menuNm, m.MENU_DC as menuDc, m.PARENT_MENU_ID as parentMenuId, m.MENU_ORDR as menuOrdr, m.MENU_URL as menuUrl, m.ICON_NM as iconNm, m.USE_AT as useAt, m.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM as frstRegistPnttm, m.FRST_REGISTER_ID as frstRegisterId, m.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM as lastUpdtPnttm, m.LAST_UPDUSR_ID as lastUpdusrId, p.MENU_NM as parentMenuNm FROM MES_MENU_INFO m LEFT JOIN MES_MENU_INFO p ON m.PARENT_MENU_ID = p.MENU_ID WHERE m.MENU_ID = #{menuId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MES_MENU_INFO ( MENU_ID, MENU_NM, MENU_DC, PARENT_MENU_ID, MENU_ORDR, MENU_URL, ICON_NM, USE_AT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #{menuId}, #{menuNm}, #{menuDc}, #{parentMenuId} NULL, #{menuOrdr}, #{menuUrl}, #{iconNm}, #{useAt}, NOW(), #{frstRegisterId}, NOW(), #{lastUpdusrId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MES_MENU_INFO SET MENU_NM = #{menuNm}, MENU_DC = #{menuDc}, PARENT_MENU_ID = #{parentMenuId} NULL, MENU_ORDR = #{menuOrdr}, MENU_URL = #{menuUrl}, ICON_NM = #{iconNm}, USE_AT = #{useAt}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = NOW(), LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId}
mapper.select:
SELECT PERMISSION_ID as permissionId, PERMISSION_NM as permissionNm, PERMISSION_DC as permissionDc, PERMISSION_LEVEL as permissionLevel, USE_AT as useAt, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM as frstRegistPnttm, FRST_REGISTER_ID as frstRegisterId, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM as lastUpdtPnttm, LAST_UPDUSR_ID as lastUpdusrId FROM MES_PERMISSION_TYPE WHERE USE_AT = 'Y'
AND PERMISSION_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{permissionNm}, '%')
AND PERMISSION_LEVEL = #{permissionLevel}
ORDER BY PERMISSION_LEVEL, PERMISSION_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MES_PERMISSION_TYPE ( PERMISSION_ID, PERMISSION_NM, PERMISSION_DC, PERMISSION_LEVEL, USE_AT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #{permissionId}, #{permissionNm}, #{permissionDc}, #{permissionLevel}, #{useAt}, NOW(), #{frstRegisterId}, NOW(), #{lastUpdusrId} )

INSERT INTO MES_ROLE_MENU_PERMISSION ( ROLE_MENU_ID, GROUP_ID, MENU_ID, PERMISSION_ID, USE_AT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #{roleMenuId}, #{groupId}, #{menuId}, #{permissionId}, #{useAt}, NOW(), #{frstRegisterId}, NOW(), #{lastUpdusrId} )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.MENU_ID as menuId, m.MENU_NM as menuNm, m.MENU_DC as menuDc, m.PARENT_MENU_ID as parentMenuId, m.MENU_ORDR as menuOrdr, m.MENU_URL as menuUrl, m.ICON_NM as iconNm, m.USE_AT as useAt, CASE WHEN MAX(p.PERMISSION_LEVEL) = 'write' THEN 'write' ELSE 'read' END as permissionLevel, 1 as accessible FROM MES_MENU_INFO m INNER JOIN MES_ROLE_MENU_PERMISSION rmp ON m.MENU_ID = rmp.MENU_ID INNER JOIN MES_PERMISSION_TYPE p ON rmp.PERMISSION_ID = p.PERMISSION_ID WHERE m.USE_AT = 'Y' AND rmp.USE_AT = 'Y' AND p.USE_AT = 'Y' AND rmp.GROUP_ID = #{groupId} GROUP BY m.MENU_ID, m.MENU_NM, m.MENU_DC, m.PARENT_MENU_ID, m.MENU_ORDR, m.MENU_URL, m.ICON_NM, m.USE_AT ORDER BY m.PARENT_MENU_ID, m.MENU_ORDR, m.MENU_ID

SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(p.PERMISSION_LEVEL) = 'write' THEN 'write' WHEN MAX(p.PERMISSION_LEVEL) = 'read' THEN 'read' ELSE 'none' END as permissionLevel FROM MES_ROLE_MENU_PERMISSION rmp INNER JOIN MES_MENU_INFO m ON rmp.MENU_ID = m.MENU_ID INNER JOIN MES_PERMISSION_TYPE p ON rmp.PERMISSION_ID = p.PERMISSION_ID WHERE rmp.GROUP_ID = #{groupId} AND m.MENU_URL = #{menuUrl} AND rmp.USE_AT = 'Y' AND m.USE_AT = 'Y' AND p.USE_AT = 'Y'
